hello.heading: Never lose sight of what’s important
hello.subheading: Don’t just solve tickets, build customer relationships

features.heading: Unlimited Agents
features.subheading: Unlimited free agents to power up your customer support.
features.content: More agents mean continuous engagement, more tickets resolved and better customer support on offer. There is no number attached to your number of customer support agents.

features.heading: Chatbot
features.subheading: Resolve customer queries round-the-clock across text and voice.
features.content: Let the chatbot tackle simple repetitive queries that don’t require the soft skills and experience of your agents and when required, seamlessly loop in live agents.

features.heading: Analytics
features.subheading: Analytics and reports to monitor your agent performance.
features.content: Get deep actionable insights to deliver outstanding support and achieve your goals. The easy-to-analyse analytics reports will help your agents scale up their customer support.

features.heading: Video Call / Screen Sharing
features.subheading: High-quality video calls wherever your customer is.
features.content: Get on a video call with your customer to co-browse your customer’s screen. Take control of the meeting as your customer screen shares to show information or raise an issue.

features.heading: Workflow
features.subheading: Automatically assign conversations to a team or a dedicated agent.
features.content: Get started with our existing Workflow or set up your customised Workflow based on your business support needs.

features.heading: Screen Control
features.subheading: Control your customer’s screen from where you are
features.content: Work on the remote screen as if you are really there. Once you get access, get complete control of your customer’s screen, mouse and keyboard to quickly resolve issues.

campaign.heading: Connect conversations across Channels and tools.
campaign.subheading: Deliver personalized, engaging and seamless experiences.

features.heading: Multi channel support
features.subheading: Support your customers on their preferred channel.
features.content: Give your customers a better support experience via their preferred channel- SMS, Email, Voice, Push Notification, WhatsApp and more. Meet your customers where they are.

features.heading: Draggable Flow
features.subheading: Drag and drop to create an omnichannel flow with ‘if-then’ scenarios.
features.content: Choose when you need to initiate an SMS, email, or messaging conversation in a single workflow. Create a flow that is as simple or as complex as your business needs them to be.

features.heading: Time Based Condition
features.subheading: Send perfectly timed automated messages.
features.content: Build a thoughtful sending schedule with time-based conditions that control the time zone of when your campaigns are delivered. Support your customers at the right time.

features.heading: API based Conditions
features.subheading: Get information instantly for real-time interactions.
features.content: Call for data even when in mid of a flow by sending data to a third-party system or requesting data needed for your communication steps. Deliver real-time information to your customers.

features.heading: Contry Based Condition
features.subheading: Support your customers across the world.
features.content: Create personalized and memorable experiences for your customer across countries, languages, content, channels, flows and more. Easily connect, customize and communicate.

morefeatures.more: Provide customer support via screen sharing on a single click

segmento.heading: Personalize customer journeys with Data segmentation.
segmento.subheading: Segment people based on their demographics, behaviour, interests and other characteristics.

features.heading: Create filters as per segment
features.subheading: Create a filtered list on your business phonebook.
features.content: Tailor your marketing efforts by targeting people based on their requirements, traits or patterns by creating a particular filter on your phonebook.

features.heading: Automation Trigger
features.subheading: Trigger meaningful information for the filtered segments.
features.content: Automate actions on the filters created based on the user’s action or input to deliver relevant and personalised messages for each group.

features.heading: Automation Repeater
features.subheading: Send the most relevant content at the most relevant time.
features.content: Send auto messages to the same filter at time-based intervals through your audience’s preferred business communication channel.

features.heading: Open API
features.subheading: Use API to get, create, update or delete contact.
features.content: We provide APIs for every action, big or small, so that you can focus on what matters most- building your amazing product.

otp.heading: Simplest, quickest and most effective way to verify your users
otp.subheading: Build customer trust and enable business protection with two-factor authentication.

features.heading: Simple as Login With Google
features.subheading: Login with OTP is as simple as login with Gmail
features.content: Give your users a fast, non-disruptive and simple authentication experience. Implement login with OTP by entering your mobile number or email address to receive OTP via SMS or email.

features.heading: Inbuilt IP Security
features.subheading: Protect against fraud, hacks, validation, blocking
features.content: Minimize fraud with an extra layer of security. The inbuilt security ensures that when a login is risky the flow does not allow the bad actor to login by viewing it as potentially fraudulent.

features.heading: Support multiple channels
features.subheading: Build customer trust and increase conversion across multiple channels
features.content: Authenticate your users on channels they prefer. We support multiple channels including SMS, email, Voice, WhatsApp giving businesses and users the flexibility they need to authenticate.

features.heading: No Code

knowledgebase.subheading: Get all essential features of knowledge base software at nominal price

features.heading: WYSIWYG editor
features.subheading: Easily create or edit your knowledge base articles
features.content: Quickly create your articles with the what you see is what you get content editor. It is as simple to use as if you were using a Word Processor or HTML Editor.

features.heading: SEO friendly (Subfolder and subdomain both support)

features.content: Your knowledge base is run on your own domain and not on any subdomain so the algorithms treat it as your website giving it the same importance as your other webpages.

features.heading: Whitelabel

sms.heading: Engage your customers globally with quick, scalable and customizable messages
sms.subheading: Integrate our developer-friendly APIs to send and receive text messages. Our distributed carrier network and intelligent routing ensure highest delivery and lowest latency.

features.heading: Intelligent SMS Retry Algorithm
features.content: Our SMS API service finds the most reliable and quickest telecom route for every message you send. In case the SMS fails, our algorithm retries it within a fraction of a second and delivers your messages using another telecom route.

features.heading: Reliable, Scalable, and Feature-Rich SMS API
features.content: Available in all programming languages, integration with our SMS API for developers is quick, easy, and seamless. Built for developers by developers, explore quick-start guides, code snippets, SDKs, and more.

features.heading: Enjoy Low Latency Delivery-Worldwide
features.content: Reach 210+ countries reliably with localized telecom operators. The automatic rerouting of global traffic in real-time helps us avoid outages and latency.

features.heading: Multi-Lingual Support
features.content: Converse with your audience in their local language and take your customer engagement to the next level. Build customer confidence as you send messages in their regional language anywhere across the world.

features.heading: Personalized SMS
features.subheading: Increase customer satisfaction with meaningful engagement.
features.content: Don’t just engage with customers, create personalized experiences by adding characteristics to your messages. Harness the power of personalization to boost your ROI.

features.heading: Link Shortener
features.subheading: Transform a long URL into a shorter, more readable link.
features.content: Enable the deeply integrated link shortener to convert long URLs to shorter links. Get a detailed user report on clicks with mobile numbers, browser, and IP.

features.heading: Enhanced Analytics
features.subheading: Real-time graphical view for monitoring and troubleshooting.
features.content: Optimize your SMS delivery, measure the effectiveness of your campaigns, and improve ROI. Always be in the know which messages customers have received and which are missed.

rcs.heading: Engage customers in their SMS inbox by delivering rich and interactive messages using RCS
rcs.subheading: RCS is an integrated messaging channel that enables businesses to engage with customers through rich, immersive two-way conversations

features.heading: Corporate Communications with Branding
features.subheading: Distinguish by branding
features.content: Enhance your brand's visibility in the SMS inbox using a distinctive sender ID and logo. Utilize a visually appealing interface to effectively engage customers.

features.heading: Provide Multimedia Interactions
features.subheading: Communication through visual representation
features.content: Enhance your brand communication by delivering RCS that builds trust. Incorporate your logo, brand name, videos, images, and carousels into your messaging to increase conversions.

features.heading: Boost Sales Through Interactive Conversations
features.content: Craft an engaging conversation experience with images, videos, carousels, and interactive action buttons. Stand out from competitors by sending engaging and reliable RCS messages that drive conversions.

features.heading: Enhanced Customer Trust
features.subheading: Understand your customers' habits
features.content: Personalize your communication, and build lasting relationships that drive loyalty. Utilize verified and badged sender IDs vetted by Google for higher response rates and enhanced trust and credibility.

email.heading: Smart emails that land directly into the right inbox
email.subheading: Make the most of these powerful touchpoints between your brand and your customers.

features.heading: Email Template Builder
features.subheading: Drag-and-drop to create the layout of your email.
features.content: Customize your transactional emails using our no-code, drag-and-drop interface. Preview to see how your email will look when viewed on different devices.

features.heading: AMP Emails
features.subheading: Rich interactive emails to increase user engagement.
features.content: Rich interactive emails to increase user engagement. Your customers can interact dynamically with your message directly in the email to perform tasks and CTAs with fewer steps and zero redirects.

features.heading: Statistics
features.subheading: Monitor and track every aspect of your email’s lifecycle.
features.content: Get a graphical representation of the delivery rates, open rates, click-through rates, bounce rates, and spam to iterate and ensure you reach your customer's inbox.

features.heading: SMTP/RestAPI support
features.subheading: Integrate with our RESTful APIs and SMTP in minutes.
features.content: Integrate with our RESTful APIs and SMTP in minutes. Get your hands on our comprehensive documentation or connect with our support superheroes to easily integrate into your custom or third-party apps to start sending emails.

features.heading: Email Validation
features.subheading: Positively impact the engagement and reputation of your brand.
features.content: Deliver more messages to real contacts with our real-time API that detects and suppresses invalid email address with an accuracy rate of up to 85% to give you a clean list.

voice.heading: Boost customer engagement and build trust
voice.subheading: Start real-time conversations with crystal clear audio, low latency and deeper insights.

features.heading: Call Monitoring
features.subheading: Introducing the next-level communication experience with our all-new Call Monitoring features
features.content: We're putting you in the driver's seat of your conversations with callers. These robust features give you greater control and insight during your calls, ensuring enhanced communication and customer satisfaction. Call spying: your secret weapon for quality assurance! Call barging: real-time support, is just a click away! Call whispering: guidance at your fingertips!

features.heading: Direct calling from browser
features.subheading: Skip the 2-way calling and directly call from browser.
features.content: Save your agent calling time and enhance customer experience. Easily connect two phone numbers without keeping one on hold to start a customer conversation.

features.heading: IVR Flow
features.subheading: Modern IVR that makes customer interaction quick and hassle-free.
features.content: Smart IVR system that offers more that just resolving queries. Besides the usual, you can create a time-based or agent-based setting and even record a message.

features.heading: Bulk Voice
features.subheading: Speak directly with your audience over a single call.
features.content: Record your voice message and blast the message you wish to convey to hundreds and thousands of customer in one go. A ringing phone call is usually hard to ignore.

features.heading: Multiple Way to Upload File
features.subheading: Upload your audio message in multiple ways.
features.content: Amplify your customer interaction with personalised voice message. Record your message for bulk voice call or IVR menu through text-to-speech, browser mic or phone call.

features.heading: Bulk voice with IVR
features.subheading: Connect your voice call to the IVR.
features.content: Not just send a bulk voice message but also get a response from your users. Record the message you’d like to convey and send it to your customers using an IVR.

features.heading: Real time connect with agent on user input on bulk call
features.subheading: Direct your user to your support agent.
features.content: Up the customer experience game by offering real-time support when you connect your users to your customer support agents based on their bulk call input.

whatsapp.heading: Drive better customer engagement outcomes
whatsapp.subheading: Meet your customers where they already are, on the platform with 2 billion+ users.

features.heading: Whatsapp ChatBot
features.content: A WhatsApp chatbot automates customer interactions with pre-programmed responses and workflows. It can handle common queries, schedule appointments, track your order, offer customer support, and work 24/7. Chatbots use keywords and quick replies to engage customers and can escalate complex issues to human agents, ensuring a seamless experience.

features.heading: Whatsapp Integrations
features.content: Our WhatsApp Business API integrates seamlessly with numerous platforms, allowing for easy plug-and-play functionality without the need for additional development. Some of the supported platforms include Zoho, Freshworks, WebEngage, MoEngage, CleverTap, Shopify, Wix, Google Sheet, Tally, GIDDH and more.

features.heading: Zero Charge on Click to WhatsApp Ads
features.content: Offering zero charge on Click to WhatsApp Ads means businesses can use these ads without incurring additional costs associated with WhatsApp session charges. This approach provides significant benefits as No Session Charges and Budget-Friendly.

features.heading: Whatsapp Catalogue
features.content: WhatsApp's catalogue feature lets businesses showcase products and services within the app. It serves as a digital storefront, allowing customers to browse, view details, and make inquiries without leaving WhatsApp. Businesses can organize items, include images, prices, and descriptions, and update inventory in real time, making it easier for customers to explore and shop.

features.heading: Broadcast / Campaign
features.content: WhatsApp's broadcast lets you send the same message to multiple contacts at once, ideal for updates and announcements. Campaigns, available in the WhatsApp Business API, enable targeted marketing with automated, personalized messages. Both help businesses reach more people efficiently.

features.heading: Click Counts
features.content: Click counts indicate how many businesses or customers use a feature - high click counts show its popularity and effectiveness for customer engagement. You can view all click counts for a button either in the analytics section or through your webhook.

features.heading: Support Base64
features.subheading: Send the body in JSON and leave the rest to us.
features.content: No need to make a URL or upload your file as you can directly send JSON body and it will be converted automatically into Base64 format and sent via WhatsApp.

features.heading: 2-way Communication
features.subheading: Say hello to go on HELLO.
features.content: Give your customer the right platform to continue the conversation. Once they reply, they are directly taken to HELLO to start a 2-way communication with your business.

features.heading: Manage Template Inside Panel
features.subheading: Create and manage your templates right here.
features.content: No need to switch platforms to create your template. You can create the templates, manage it and check the status of it right here without going on Facebook.

features.heading: Analytics
features.subheading: Get graphical insights into your business messages.
features.content: Analyse and improvise your business messaging with the right metrics. Get a graphical report on the number of messages sent, delivered, conversations and more.

features.heading: Export Logs
features.subheading: Get individual outbound and inbound messages logs.
features.content: Export the logs for better viewing and insights. Get details of all the outbound and inbound messages and conversations your business had with your customers.

numbers.tagline: Unlock the Power of Virtual Numbers
numbers.heading: Receive, Reply, and Customize SMS with Long Codes, for Ultimate Engagement and Communication!

features.heading: Global Market Entry with Numbers: Expanding Your Presence
features.content: Numbers offer an effective strategy for businesses seeking to broaden their reach in the market. These numbers facilitate the creation of a local connection by acquiring a phone number, streamlining communication with customers and associates. By leveraging numbers, businesses can establish trust, enhance accessibility, bridge geographic divides, all while projecting a professional image and optimizing cost-effectiveness. This approach is especially beneficial for international enterprises looking to seize opportunities in the diverse and competitive market.

features.heading: Cost Efficiency
features.content: Numbers in present a cost-effective alternative to traditional phone lines. They require fewer upfront expenses, minimize maintenance costs, and eliminate the need for physical infrastructure, making them a financially efficient choice for businesses of all scales in the market.

features.heading: Missed Call Services
features.content: A number of virtual number providers offer functionalities like missed call alerts and notifications, enabling businesses to promptly engage with customers who were unable to establish contact. This feature enhances customer communication and responsiveness within the market.

features.heading: Keyword Specific Messaging
features.subheading: You can choose a unique keyword for your business or campaign
features.content: When users send an SMS starting with your chosen keyword to your dedicated or shared long code, you can receive these messages. This feature enables personalized and context-specific communication.

features.heading: Keyword Independent Messaging
features.subheading: In addition to keywords
features.content: you can receive messages without specific keywords. This broadens your communication options, allowing users to reach you without the need for predefined keywords.

features.heading: Pre-formatted Set of Questions
features.content: You can set up a pre-formatted set of questions to send to your audience. This is particularly useful for conducting surveys, quizzes, or gathering specific information in a structured format.

features.heading: Online Surveys
features.content: Use our Numbers service to create and conduct online surveys. Collect valuable insights and feedback from your audience with ease.

features.heading: Lead Generation
features.content: Engage in lead generation by allowing potential customers to reach out to you through SMS. Gather contact details and inquiries, helping you grow your customer base.

features.heading: Create Auto Responses
features.content: You have the option to set up automated responses for messages you receive. Customize these responses to provide immediate feedback or information to your users.

features.heading: Integration into Web Applications
features.content: Seamlessly integrate Numbers into your web application or software. This allows you to extend the capabilities of your software and enhance user communication.

This approach is especially beneficial for international enterprises looking to seize opportunities in the diverse and competitive market.

faqs.des:
• A drip campaign is a series of automated emails sent over time to guide leads through the sales funnel.
  • Each email is scheduled based on customer behaviour or set timelines, ensuring timely, personalised engagement.
  • Drip campaigns help nurture leads, build relationships, and drive conversions.

faqs.que: How does Email Marketing support business growth?
faqs.des:
• Email marketing allows direct communication with your audience, keeping your brand top-of-mind.
  • It’s cost-effective, with a high ROI, helping businesses reach their customers efficiently.
  • You can segment your audience and personalise email content, improving engagement and conversions.

faqs.que: What is Marketing Automation, and why is it important?
faqs.des:
• Marketing automation uses software to streamline repetitive marketing tasks, like email campaigns and follow-ups via multiple channels, such as WhatsApp, text messages, voice SMS, and RCS.
  • It allows businesses to engage with potential customers at scale while saving time and resources.
  • Marketing automation platforms can also provide valuable analytics to refine marketing strategies and improve ROI.

• Sales funnel builders are tools that help create a structured path for leads, guiding them from awareness to conversion.
  • They automate various stages of customer journeys, helping move leads through the sales process seamlessly.
  • With these tools, businesses can capture more leads, nurture relationships, and increase conversions.

faqs.que: How does B2B Marketing differ from B2C?
faqs.des:
• B2B marketing focuses on business clients, requiring a more data-driven, solution-oriented approach.
  • It often involves longer sales cycles and personalised, targeted communications to address business-specific pain points.
  • B2B marketing relies on building trust and long-term relationships, as purchases are typically larger and require approval from multiple stakeholders.

faqs.que: Why is a Marketing Platform essential for B2B companies?
faqs.des:
• A marketing platform centralises tools for campaign management, analytics, and automation, enhancing efficiency.
  • It helps track customer behaviour across channels, providing insights that optimise B2B strategies.
  • With a unified platform, companies can streamline workflows, increase ROI, and improve customer engagement.

features.content: Numbers in India offer a more budget-friendly alternative compared to traditional landlines. numbers.tagline: Unlock the Power of Virtual Numbers
numbers.heading: Receive, Reply, and Customize SMS with Long Codes, for Ultimate Engagement and Communication!

features.heading: Unlocking Global Markets with Numbers: Expanding Reach in the US
features.content: Numbers open doors for businesses seeking to break into the American market. They offer the means to acquire a local US phone number, facilitating seamless connections with customers and collaborators in the USA. These virtual numbers enhance accessibility, projecting professionalism, and streamlining communication, all while offering cost-effective solutions for global expansion. This approach is invaluable for international companies aiming to tap into the thriving US market.

features.heading: Missed Call Services
features.content: Some virtual number providers offer functionalities such as missed call alerts and notifications, enabling U.S. businesses to promptly address customers who were unable to make contact. This feature aids in delivering timely support and boosting customer interaction in the American market.

features.heading: Keyword Specific Messaging
features.subheading: You can choose a unique keyword for your business or campaign
features.content: When users send an SMS starting with your chosen keyword to your dedicated or shared long code, you can receive these messages. This feature enables personalized and context-specific communication.

features.heading: Keyword Independent Messaging
features.subheading: In addition to keywords
features.content: you can receive messages without specific keywords. This broadens your communication options, allowing users to reach you without the need for predefined keywords.

features.heading: Pre-formatted Set of Questions
features.content: You can set up a pre-formatted set of questions to send to your audience. This is particularly useful for conducting surveys, quizzes, or gathering specific information in a structured format.

features.heading: Online Surveys
features.content: Use our Numbers service to create and conduct online surveys. Collect valuable insights and feedback from your audience with ease.

features.heading: Lead Generation
features.content: Engage in lead generation by allowing potential customers to reach out to you through SMS. Gather contact details and inquiries, helping you grow your customer base.

features.heading: Create Auto Responses
features.content: You have the option to set up automated responses for messages you receive. Customize these responses to provide immediate feedback or information to your users.

features.heading: Integration into Web Applications
features.content: Seamlessly integrate Numbers into your web application or software. This allows you to extend the capabilities of your software and enhance user communication.
